meanings.sent3: The ingathering of socks in the laundry seemed to multiply overnight!
meanings.sent4: Her ingathering of knowledge from various sources enriched her understanding.
meanings.sent5: The ingathering of colorful leaves in the park created a beautiful mosaic.
